Package com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class ClickGUI

java.lang.Object
com.lukflug.panelstudio.ClickGUI
public class ClickGUI
extends java.lang.Object
Object representing the entire GUI. All components should be a direct or indirect child of this objects.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.List<FixedComponent> components
    List of direct child components (i.e. panels).
    protected Interface inter
    The Interface to be used by the GUI.
    protected int width
    The width of the panels.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClickGUI​(Interface inter, int width)
    Constructor for the GUI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addComponent​(FixedComponent component)
    Add a component to the GUI.
    void exit()
    Handle the GUI being closed.
    java.util.List<FixedComponent> getComponents()
    Get a list of panels in the GUI.
    void handleButton​(int button)
    Handle a mouse button state change.
    void handleKey​(int scancode)
    Handle a key being typed.
    void render()
    Render the GUI (lowest component first, highest component last).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • components

      protected java.util.List<FixedComponent> components
      List of direct child components (i.e. panels). The must all be FixedComponent.

    • inter

      protected Interface inter
      The Interface to be used by the GUI.

    • width

      protected final int width
      The width of the panels.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClickGUI

      public ClickGUI​(Interface inter, int width)
      Constructor for the GUI.
      Parameters:
      inter - the Interface to be used by the GUI
      width - the width of the panels.

  • Method Details

    • getComponents

      public java.util.List<FixedComponent> getComponents()
      Get a list of panels in the GUI.
      Returns:
      list of all panels (direct children)

    • addComponent

      public void addComponent​(FixedComponent component)
      Add a component to the GUI.
      Parameters:
      component - component to be added

    • render

      public void render()
      Render the GUI (lowest component first, highest component last).

    • handleButton

      public void handleButton​(int button)
      Handle a mouse button state change.
      Parameters:
      button - the button that changed its state
      See Also:
      Interface.LBUTTON, Interface.RBUTTON

    • handleKey

      public void handleKey​(int scancode)
      Handle a key being typed.
      Parameters:
      scancode - the scancode of the key being typed

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Handle the GUI being closed.
